author: chris.eth
content:
Occasionally seeing:
```2021-04-21T16:59:12.705773Z    ERROR    node/duty_execution.go:63    received invalid signature    {"app": "Starts an instance of SSV node", "node_id": 4, "start_time": "2021-04-21T16:59:07.000000Z", "committee_index": 12, "slot": 1110295, "role": "ATTESTER", "error": "could not verify signature from iBFT member 2", "errorVerbose": "could not verify signature from iBFT member 2
github.com/bloxapp/ssv/node.(*ssvNode).verifyPartialSignature
	/go/src/github.com/bloxapp/ssv/node/signature.go:35
github.com/bloxapp/ssv/node.(*ssvNode).waitForSignatureCollection
	/go/src/github.com/bloxapp/ssv/node/duty_execution.go:62
github.com/bloxapp/ssv/node.(*ssvNode).postConsensusDutyExecution
	/go/src/github.com/bloxapp/ssv/node/duty_execution.go:111
github.com/bloxapp/ssv/node.(*ssvNode).executeDuty.func1
	/go/src/github.com/bloxapp/ssv/node/duty_execution.go:230
runtime.goexit
	/usr/local/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1374"}```

author: chris.eth
content: Always from iBFT member 2. I'm node 4 in b3119aa267189ba9069cbb93900b70f0b837ed944334f92122d95b72eb1791ccd890c9396aea890f29b9e97b5ff7b13f.
